Topic.Title: Talking to command not working please help

Posts.EditableText: I'm going through the tutorial and the talk to command comes up and it won't work. I've looked at people with the same problem and tried what they did to make it work but it hasn't worked. I don't know what I'm missing and any help will be appreciated.
